english.segment1: Ive been here a thousand times before.. Face down on the floor. Wondering how I even reached this place again
english.segment2: [PRECHORUS]. But youve shown so endlessly, How your love pours over me, No picture can re-create the beauty that I see
english.segment3: [CHORUS]. Show me what it means, To live my life a sacrifice, If only I would realize how much. It took to pay the price, I know Id always give, Everything to you
english.segment4: I want this world to always see. Your perfect majesty, Reflecting from my life this brilliant poetry
english.segment5: [PRECHORUS]. Written all over this place, The signs of all creation that you breathed, Words cant even state how much you mean to me
english.segment7: I want to face my very crime, Of not always giving all of mine, But I can feel the hope you bring to me
